txt.en:
'Mama! Papa!'

The little girl sobs.

'I am scared... I cannot find Mama and Papa. I want my doll, Bote! I lost her when I hid from the monsters! Please find Bote!'

Léofrun clutches the doll to her breast.

'Oh thank you, kind [placeholder]! Do you think you can find my Mama and Papa?

'Nay, I suppose not....'

The girl begins to weep again.
After you rescued the frightened child, Léofrun, from the ruins of Thornhope, she took refuge with Thane Béortnoth.
Bote, Léofrun's doll, is somewhere within the ruins of Thornhope.\n\nLéofrun has asked you to find her doll Bote.
Bring the doll to Léofrun outside Thornhope
Léofrun is encamped outside the walls of Thornhope.\n\nYou should return the frightened little girl's doll to its owner.
